Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides a one-year utility bill tax and surcharge holiday and two-year green energy tax holiday
Summary: Establishes a one-year utility bill tax and surcharge holiday and a two-year green energy tax holiday.
LawCode: Add §§47-a & 47-b, Tax L; add §89-l, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing a one-year utility bill tax and surcharge holiday; and to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a two-year green energy tax holiday
